group_1.textCenter: Oh, Sae. You worked hard today, huh?

group_1.textLeft: It's okay, no one else is around.

group_1.textRight: Uuuggghhh...
I'm beat...

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle* Sae's "off switch"!
You sound like an old man sometimes,@you know that?

group_1.textRight: ...Shut it.
This is about the only place I can complain.

group_1.textLeft: So, how'd your day go?

group_1.textRight: As usual, I performed flawlessly from@start to finish.
Oh, but the old lady I gave a hand to@the other day called the school.
That was a nice surprise.

group_1.textLeft: Ah, it helps that you have your name written@so prominently on your bag, huh?

group_1.textRight: It's not like I have it there for ulterior motives...
I just can't afford to buy a new one.

group_1.textLeft: You're pretty amazing. You're able to@work so hard towards your dreams.

group_1.textRight: *Sigh*... I have no other choice but to@work hard.

group_1.textLeft: But it's not like you have to make connections@and curry favor with rich girls to make it big.
I think you've got the will of a comic book hero.

group_1.textRight: Is that supposed to be a compliment?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:800100:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Of course it's a compliment!
I even modeled the main character of the@play I'm writing after you in some ways.
You're strong and cool, just like a protagonist.

group_1.textRight: That's embarrassing...
Hmm, I wonder if that means I can@collect royalties?

group_1.textLeft: So greedy~

group_1.textRight: More importantly, I have good news today.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, a new road to success?

group_1.textRight: That's right! The other dayâ€”

group_1.textLeft: Hey.

group_1.textRight: *Giggling*

group_1.textLeft: Just you two...
Please don't scare me like that...

group_1.textRight: The contrast between how you act and the real@you is what's scary, no matter how much I see it.
Really...? I find it rather charming.

group_1.textLeft: Sae's very existence is like a@wellspring of inspiration.
It keeps my writing flowing.@*Giggle*

group_1.textRight: ...Isn't that a bit messed up?
Oh, a play for the next performance?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, but right now I'm having trouble with@the last act...

group_1.textRight: If you're all right with amateur opinions,@feel free to consult us anytime.
By the way, Sae, how's your part-time work@going lately?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, yes! Please listen to this!
I actually landed a part-time job a@short while ago that pays quite well.

group_1.textRight: ...It's nothing shady, is it?

group_1.textLeft: Of course not. It's just private tutoring.
But the one I'm tutoring is the daughter of@a prestigious school's director.
We just happened to become friends through@volunteer work.

group_1.textRight: You mean...

group_1.textLeft: Yes! I was able to get close to a rich young lady.
And if I can build up a good reputation as a tutor...
Your reputation within the school will skyrocket!

group_1.textRight: Precisely.
Quite the schemer, aren't you? *Giggle*

group_1.textLeft: And get this, the hourly wage is...

group_1.textRight: ...Is that really okay?

group_1.textLeft: ...Probably?
But my family is struggling to make ends meet...@to a degree it hasn't seen in years.
I can't afford to be complacent.

group_1.textRight: I know you're going through tough times,@but don't overwork yourself, okay?

group_1.textLeft: Well then, since I'm so tired, would you@care to give me a shoulder massage?

group_1.textRight: Oi, don't push your luck.
But fine, I'll go ahead and do it anyway.

group_1.textLeft: ...No, I was just kidding.
[chara:305501:effect_shake]Wait, stop, that tickles!
Well then, I'm off to club activities!

group_1.textRight: Take care! I'm looking forward to@your performance.

group_1.textLeft: I'm a playwright! I don't perform on stage.

group_1.textRight: She's a hardworking girl, too.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, I'm looking forward to the play.

group_1.textRight: Oh yeah, Sae.
In the next science show, we're gonna do an experiment with dry ice and soap bubbles.
Do you mind joining the rehearsal?

group_1.textLeft: ...That one again? You must be@really fond of it.

group_1.textRight: It's a good one. Kids love that flashy stuff.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, that's true.
